metadata.synopsis: Cinematic Cutscene with the character using a ladder to get from the Underdark to the Goblin Camp
metadata.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game.2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto 153.71, 64.79, -263.724. Click on the ladder - will launch the cinematic.5. ReCon: "oe und_cine_reset" -  this will allow to see the cinematic again when clicking on the ladder (by default the game shows it only once)
